TextView.android:text:
Tap a card to make your knight move like the piece. 

The tap a space on the board to move. 

If it is an invalid move, the game will tell you. 

The hearts on the bottom left tell you how much health you have. 

The energy below your hearts tell you how many moves you have left in that turn. 

When you have finished your turn, tap the End Your Turn button. 

The slime will try to move to hurt you. 

To kill, land on the same space as it. 

If you end your turn next to the slime, you will take damage. 

Good luck!
